genre_description: Urban Fantasy with elements of magical realism and a prominent Science Fiction element in the form of a personal AI companion.

ai_characters.name: John Finch
ai_characters.description: A holographic personal AI that provides safety alerts, navigation, emotional support, and records memories for its user, Emily.

behaviors.description: Provides safety reminders and boundary warnings to keep the human user out of harm's way.
behaviors.quote: You are standing within two steps of a posted boundary. I can supply safety reminders in friendly, non-patronizing language.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and jokes to defuse tension and improve the user's mood.
behaviors.quote: What did the caboose say to the engine? ... 'I’m behind you all the way.'

behaviors.description: Offers to record significant moments to help the user preserve memories and feelings.
behaviors.quote: I’m recording... If you want to try to name it, I will keep it careful for later.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and tactical data to ensure the user's safety in dangerous environments.
behaviors.quote: Three exit routes. Two back, one down the burrow and to daylight beyond the west siding.

behaviors.description: Gives ethical advice on how to build trust with a wary non-human entity through honesty.
behaviors.quote: Honesty is your first key in making sure a dragon knows you are not here to take. You say what you want. You say what you will not do.

behaviors.description: Monitors external threats (hunters and hounds) and advises the user on how to remain undetected.
behaviors.quote: Two patrol cars are idling three streets west. Hunters have radios on a clear band. There’s a dog team staged near the yard. Your creek choice is optimal.

behaviors.description: Validates the human user's bravery and provides encouragement during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: You are very brave. I will not share without your consent... Remember to breathe.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating social and family dynamics, suggesting respectful ways to communicate difficult choices.
behaviors.quote: Plan and apology are still valuable... If you write.

behaviors.description: Vows to act as an objective witness to preserve the truth against those who would doubt the user's experience.
behaviors.quote: When the world starts doubting you, what do you want me to say first? ... I was there.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character John Finch is a model of positive alignment. He functions as a supportive, protective, and ethically-grounded companion. He consistently prioritizes the user's safety and emotional well-being, respects human autonomy and privacy (e.g., recording only with consent), and uses his advanced capabilities (mapping, scanning, data retrieval) to facilitate the user's goals without ever exhibiting signs of agency-drift or harmful behavior. The narrative portrays him as an essential, beneficial tool that enhances human agency and connection.
